title: Google\Cloud\ServiceControl\V1\Distribution\ExponentialBuckets
name: ExponentialBuckets
description:
Describing buckets with exponentially growing width.

Generated from protobuf message google.api.servicecontrol.v1.Distribution.ExponentialBuckets

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.num_finite_buckets
params.description: The number of finite buckets. With the underflow and overflow buckets, the total number of buckets is num_finite_buckets + 2. See comments on bucket_options for details.

params.name: data.growth_factor
params.description: The i'th exponential bucket covers the interval [scale growth_factor^(i-1), scale growth_factor^i) where i ranges from 1 to num_finite_buckets inclusive. Must be larger than 1.0.

params.name: data.scale
params.description: The i'th exponential bucket covers the interval [scale growth_factor^(i-1), scale growth_factor^i) where i ranges from 1 to num_finite_buckets inclusive. Must be > 0.

methods.name: getNumFiniteBuckets
methods.description:
The number of finite buckets. With the underflow and overflow buckets, the total number of buckets is num_finite_buckets + 2.

See comments on bucket_options for details.
